title: Ken Wilber: Jordan Peterson, Sam Harris & Truth
description:
Jordan Peterson and Sam Harris have had some of the most high profile discussions looking at atheism vs religion, and also, famously, a whole two hour podcast where they couldn't even agree on a definition of truth.

Could there be another perspective where these arguments are resolved? 

Integral philosopher Ken Wilber has a concept of "four quadrants" of truth. Can this help?

This is one of several films with Ken Wilber on Rebel Wisdom. To get access to the entire uncut 4 hour interview, become a supporter: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
